009
010package imagingbook.pub.threshold.global;
011
012/**
013 * Maximum entropy thresholder modeled after Kapur et al. (1985).
014 */
015public class MaxEntropyThresholder extends GlobalThresholder {
016        
017        static final double EPSILON = 1E-12;
018        
019        private double[] H0array = new double[256];     // only used for reporting
020        private double[] H1array = new double[256];     // only used for reporting
021        private double[] H01array = new double[256]; // only used for reporting
022        
023        private double[] S0 = null;
024        private double[] S1 = null;
025        
026        public MaxEntropyThresholder() {
027                super();
028        }
029        
030        public int getThreshold(int[] h) {
031                int K = h.length;       
032                double[] p = normalize(h);              // normalized histogram (probabilities)
033                makeTables(p);  // initialize S0, S1
034                
035                double P0 = 0, P1;
036                int qMax = -1;
037                double Hmax = Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY;
038                
039                for (int q = 0; q <= K-1; q++) { // one more step for logging
040                        P0 = P0 + p[q]; 
041                        P1 = 1 - P0;    
042                        double H0 = (P0 > EPSILON) ? -S0[q]/P0 + Math.log(P0) : 0;                              
043                        double H1 = (P1 > EPSILON) ? -S1[q]/P1 + Math.log(P1) : 0;                      
044                        double H01 = H0 + H1;
045                        
046                        H0array[q] = H0;        // logging only
047                        H1array[q] = H1;        // logging only
048                        H01array[q] = H01;      // logging only
049                        
050                        if (H01 > Hmax) {
051                                Hmax = H01;
052                                qMax = q;
053                        }
054                }
055                return qMax;
056        }
057        
058        private void makeTables(double[] p) {
059                int K = p.length;
060
061                // make tables S0[], S1[]
062                S0 = new double[K];
063                S1 = new double[K];
064
065                double s0 = 0;
066                for (int i = 0; i < K; i++) {
067                        if (p[i] > EPSILON) {
068                                s0 = s0 + p[i] * Math.log(p[i]);
069                        }
070                        S0[i] = s0;
071                }
072
073                double s1 = 0;
074                for (int i = K-1; i >= 0; i--) {
075                        S1[i] = s1;
076                        if (p[i] > EPSILON) {
077                                s1 = s1 + p[i] * Math.log(p[i]);
078                        }
079                }
080        }
081}
